member.name: T:Microsoft.Framework.DependencyInjection.ActivatorUtilities
member.summary: Helper code for the various activator services.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Framework.DependencyInjection.ActivatorUtilities.GetServiceOrCreateInstance(System.IServiceProvider,System.Type)
member.summary: Retrieve an instance of the given type from the service provider. If one is not found then instantiate it directly.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Framework.DependencyInjection.ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance(System.IServiceProvider,System.Type)
member.summary: Instantiate an object of the given type, using constructor service injection if possible.

member.summary: Instantiate an object of the given type, using constructor service injection if possible.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Framework.DependencyInjection.ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory(System.Type)
member.summary: Creates a factory to instantiate a type using constructor service injection if possible.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Framework.DependencyInjection.IServiceScope
member.summary: The method ends the scope lifetime. Once Dispose is called, any scoped services that have been resolved from will be disposed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Framework.DependencyInjection.IServiceScope.ServiceProvider
member.summary: The used to resolve dependencies from the scope.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Framework.DependencyInjection.IServiceScopeFactory.CreateScope
member.summary: Create an which contains an used to resolve dependencies from a newly created scope.
member.returns: An controlling the lifetime of the scope. Once this is disposed, any scoped services that have been resolved from the will also be disposed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Framework.DependencyInjection.ServiceProvider.GetService(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets the service object of the specified type.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Framework.DependencyInjection.ServiceProviderExtensions.GetService``1(System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Retrieve a service of type T from the IServiceProvider.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Framework.DependencyInjection.ServiceProviderExtensions.GetServiceOrDefault``1(System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Retrieve a service of type T from the IServiceProvider. Return T's default value if no service of type T is available.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Framework.DependencyInjection.ServiceProviderExtensions.GetServiceOrNull(System.IServiceProvider,System.Type)
member.summary: Retrieve a service of type serviceType from the IServiceProvider. Return null if no service of type serviceType is available.
